tasks.label: check_ods_and_centrifugo
tasks.command: bash -c 'RED="\033[0;31m"; GREEN="\033[0;32m"; NC="\033[0m"; echo -n "Checking omnect-device-service... "; if [ ! -S /tmp/api.sock ]; then echo -e "${RED}❌ ERROR${NC}"; echo "omnect-device-service is not running!"; echo "Please start it first from your omnect-device-service directory"; echo "See: https://github.com/omnect/omnect-device-service"; exit 1; else echo -e "${GREEN}✓${NC}"; fi; echo -n "Stopping existing centrifugo processes... "; killall centrifugo 2>/dev/null || true; echo -e "${GREEN}✓${NC}"'
